dataset_id: CMS: LiDAR Data for Mangrove Forests in the Zambezi River Delta, Mozambique, 2014
title: CMS: LiDAR Data for Mangrove Forests in the Zambezi River Delta, Mozambique, 2014
summary: This data set provides high-resolution LiDAR point cloud data collected during surveys over mangrove forests in the Zambezi River Delta in Mozambique in May 2014. The data are arranged into 144 1- by 1-km tiles.

cmr.title: CMS: LiDAR Data for Mangrove Forests in the Zambezi River Delta, Mozambique, 2014
cmr.summary: This data set provides high-resolution LiDAR point cloud data collected during surveys over mangrove forests in the Zambezi River Delta in Mozambique in May 2014. The data are arranged into 144 1- by 1-km tiles.
cmr.description: This data set provides high-resolution LiDAR point cloud data collected during surveys over mangrove forests in the Zambezi River Delta in Mozambique in May 2014. The data are arranged into 144 1- by 1-km tiles.

citation: Fatoyinbo, T., E.A. Feliciano, D. Lagomasino, S.K. Lee, and C. Trettin. 2018. Estimating mangrove aboveground biomass from airborne LiDAR data: a case study from the Zambezi River delta. Environmental Research Letters. 13(2):025012.
